entry.title: Tahoe Tack 34" x 38" American Pride Bald Eagle New Zealand Wool Western Saddle Blanket
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Saddle Blankets
Price: 119.99

Show your American Pride with this stunning Stars and Stripes Series Patriotic Blanket by Tahoe Tack. This unique and luxurious saddle blanket is adorned with the ultimate symbol of American freedom, the mighty Bald Eagle, sitting atop the American flag. This 34 x 38” Western saddle blanket is made from 100% pure New Zealand Wool, renowned for its luxurious feel, quality, and strength. This wool is breathable and moisture-wicking which helps to increase your horse's comfort by preventing overheating and excess sweating. Our tightly woven designs have been constructed to last for many years to come with proper care. This patriotic American flag design saddle blanket is hand-woven and features white stars on a blue background, paired with red and white alternating stripes. Our beautiful patriotic blanket is sure to look stunning in any parade, event, or contest you use it in.

  • HANDWOVEN PATRIOTIC DESIGN - this beautiful patriotic stars and stripe design blanket is completely hand-woven and dyed by skilled craftsmen for supreme durability and beauty that will last many years with proper care.
  • A PARADE WORTHY PAD - our saddle blanket was meticulously designed in the USA and features embroidered stars on top of hand-woven tight-knit 100% New Zealand Wool for a beautiful finish that is sure to look stunning in parades, events, and contests.
  • BALD EAGLE DESIGN - this flashy saddle blanket features an American bald eagle on either side of the blanket, atop our American flag Stars and Stripes print. This beautiful patriotic design is sure to wow in any competition, event, or parade.
  • PERFECTLY SHAPED STARS - this premium saddle blanket features perfect hand-shaped stars, unlike other inferior blankets that have misshapen hand-woven stars. This careful detail gives this blanket a smoother and cleaner finish compared to others.
  • MAKES A STUNNING RUG - this saddle blanket isn't just for horses, but is also great for your home! This beautiful 34 x 38" stars and stripes blanket can be laid flat to turn it into an attractive hand-woven patriotic rectangular rug.


Care Instructions

This Western saddle blanket should be regularly cleaned and maintained in order to ensure your horse's comfort and prolong the lifespan of the blanket. Never machine wash or dry your blanket. Instead, you should regularly clean it of dirt and fur by gently brushing it with a soft brush. Next, use a vacuum hose to remove any remaining debris from your blanket. Once your blanket is mostly clean, you can wash it with lukewarm to cold water and Woolite™ or specialty saddle pad cleaner to remove any further dirt and sweat. It's important that, after washing, you store your blanket properly on a rack without any tack on top of it to allow it to maintain its shape and thoroughly dry out.

entry.title: Tahoe Tack 34" x 36" Zara Cactus Solid New Zealand Wool Western Saddle Blanket
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Saddle Blankets
Price: 79.99

Step into the show ring with pride with this stunning Zara New Zealand Wool Western Show Blanket by Tahoe Tack. This 34 x 36” solid Western show saddle blanket is made from 100% pure New Zealand Wool, renowned for its luxurious feel, quality, and strength. This wool is breathable and moisture-wicking which helps to increase your horse's comfort by preventing overheating and excess sweating. Our tightly woven designs have been constructed to last for many years to come with proper care. Unlike inferior show blankets, ours have matching wear leathers for added durability and lifespan. Our blankets also feature brightly colored hand-painted leather cactus accents for added style and flair.

  • 100% NEW ZEALAND WOOL - our premium show blanket is made from pure New Zealand Wool. This wool is breathable and moisture-wicking for increased comfort. Our tightly woven designs have been constructed to last for many years with proper care.
  • HAND-PAINTED LEATHER ACCENTS - this stunning saddle blanket has a pair of hand-painted leather accents on either side of the back of the blanket. These hand-painted cacti add color and flair that is sure to be noticed.
  • HANDWOVEN SOLID DESIGN - this beautiful solid Western saddle blanket is completely hand-woven and dyed by skilled craftsmen for supreme durability and beauty that will last many years with proper care.
  • IDEAL FOR LAYERING - our Zara blanket measures 34 x 36” and is designed to be used on top of your regular saddle pad as a colorful and attractive show accessory. This blanket is a great way to add style without adding excess bulk.
  • STAND OUT IN THE RING - this unique solid show blanket features painted leather accents and is available in five different colors to best match your horse’s coat along with your tack and show attire. This blanket is sure to help you wow the judges!


Care Instructions

This Western saddle blanket should be regularly cleaned and maintained in order to ensure your horse's comfort and prolong the lifespan of the blanket. Never machine wash or dry your blanket. Instead, you should regularly clean it of dirt and fur by gently brushing it with a soft brush. Next, use a vacuum hose to remove any remaining debris from your blanket. Once your blanket is mostly clean, you can wash it with lukewarm to cold water and Woolite™ or specialty saddle pad cleaner to remove any further dirt and sweat. It's important that, after washing, you store your blanket properly on a rack without any tack on top of it to allow it to maintain its shape and thoroughly dry out.

entry.title: Tahoe Tack Quick Change Bit Leather Western Double Ear Headstall
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Headstalls
Price: 39.99

Tahoe Tack’s latest line of working headstalls has been designed with convenience and ease of use in mind. This new line of browband, slip ear, and double-ear leather headstalls all include new quick-change bit ends. This quick-change design features leather tab ends that are designed to securely hold your bit in place, but can be undone and re-done effortlessly in seconds for removing and changing out bits. These premium leather headstalls are ideal for multi-horse owners! Our headstalls have an adjustable 36-44” bit to bit length and have been designed to fit most horses weighing between 900 and 1250 lbs.

  • QUICK CHANGE DESIGN - this Tahoe headstall features leather tab ends that are designed to securely hold your bit in place when in use, but can be undone in seconds in order to change out or remove the bit.
  • GREAT FOR MULTI-HORSE OWNERS - if you use different bits for different horses or tasks, or use your tack for multiple horses, this headstall is perfect for you! This ultra-convenient, hassle-free, quick-change design makes swapping bits a breeze.
  • PREMIUM DOUBLE STITCHED LEATHER - our western double ear headstall is made from high-quality double-stitched leather that will last for many years with proper care and maintenance. This headstall also features stainless steel hardware.
  • DESIGNED TO FIT MOST HORSES - this headstall is sized to fit most average-to-large sized horses and breeds weighing approx. 900-1250lbs. This headstall has adjustable ear openings and a 36-44” bit to bit measurement.
  • AVAILABLE IN TWO COLORS - Tahoe’s line of quick-change headstalls is available in both Medium Oil and Dark Oil: two classic colors that are sure to complement your horse’s color and your other tack.

entry.title: Tahoe Super Soft Cashmillon Western Saddle Blanket 34" X 36"
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tack Wholesale
Type: Saddle Blankets
Price: 19.95

SIZE AND WEIGHT - this saddle blanket is 36” x 34” and is lightweight at approximately 5 lbs.

HANDWOVEN - these blankets are hand woven by skilled artisans. Due to the nature of making these by hand, there might be slight differences in each product.

RED CASHMILON - features comfortable lightweight cashmilon yarn made from acrylic in a vibrant red. This material is extremely flexible soft and fine, perfect for a luxurious ride.

HAND WASH AND DRY ONLY - to keep this product in the best condition it requires hand washing and hang drying only.

Tahoe Tack Heavy Duty Red Cashmilon Saddle Blankets are made with soft and lightweight cashmilon yarn made from acrylic. These lightweight red blankets come in size 36” x 34”, and are handwoven by skilled artisans for maximum comfort. To keep this product in good care it requires only hand washing and drying.

entry.title: Tahoe Tack Angled Engraved Knee Relief Western Show Stirrups
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Stirrups
Price: 34.95

Tahoe Tack’s engraved angled wetern stirrups were designed to enhance the overall appearance of a western rider in the show and gymkhana ring, while providing knee and hip pain relief that riders often experience. Although these stirrups are beautifully hand engraved, they are not bulky or overly flashy in a way that will distract from the riders performance. These stirrups are versatile and can be used in a variety of western events including western pleasure, horsemanship, trail, gymkhana barrel racing, and everyday riding on the trails. They simply add the right amount of elegance and comfort to your existing tack set. These stirrups only feature the engraved design on one side of each stirrup and are sold in pairs. The color/shade of the leather pieces on these stirrups may very slightly from lot to lot.  

  • DESIGNED WITH YOUR COMFORT IN MIND - these feature an offset design that aids in preventing knee and hip pain while riding that allows you to ride for longer periods of time and remain more comfortable than traditional stirrups.

  • HAND ENGRAVED DESIGN - these stirrups feature beautiful hand engraving that give the extra detail needed to set you apart in the show arena. Due to the fact that each stirrup is individually hand engraved, the engravings may vary slightly between each stirrup, but overall have the same engraving pattern.
  • IN THE SHOW RING - These stirrups are beautiful in our out of the show ring. Weather you are showing or riding on the trails, these stirrups are eye catching and make any saddle stand out from the rest.
  • STURDY ALUMINUM CONSTRUCTION - Made of strong, hand-engraved, solid aluminum that will never rust. These also feature rubber foot grips to help the riders foot stay in place throughout the entire ride.
  • AVAILABLE IN ADULT SIZE - available in Adult (5”) size to accommodate most riders. Our stirrups are universally sized to fit any western saddle.

entry.title: Tahoe Tack Silver Texas Star Show Spotted Leather Western Ladies Spur Straps
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Western Spurs & Straps
Price: 21.95

Tahoe Tack’s Silver Texas Star Show Spotted Leather Western Ladies Spur Straps is an attractive new Medium Oil leather pair of ladies spur straps that are a part of the Texas Star series. These new leather spur straps feature flashy engraved 1” Texas Star conchos placed in the center of each of the spur straps, as well as attractive stainless steel show spots covering the spur straps. These spur straps were designed for women and will fit most boot sizes. Our spur straps are adjustable from 8.5” to 10” long, and are 2.5” wide at the widest point, tapering down to ⅝”. Tahoe Tack’s Silver Texas Star collection also includes matching tack pieces such as a browband headstall, slip ear headstall, noseband, split reins, and breast collar. 


  • PART OF THE TEXAS STAR COLLECTION - this pair of spur straps is part of Tahoe Tack’s new Texas Star collection, which is composed of matching Medium Oil leather tack pieces featuring Texas Star conchos and stainless steel show spots.
  • DESIGNED TO FIT MOST WOMEN - our ladies spur straps are “one size fits all” and are designed to fit most boots. Our spur straps are adjustable from 8.5” to 10” long, and are 2.5” wide at the widest point, tapering down to ⅝”. 
  • SPOTTED TEXAS STAR DESIGN - these new leather spur straps feature flashy engraved 1” Texas Star conchos placed in the center of each of the spur straps, as well as attractive stainless steel show spots covering the spur straps. 
  • FITS ALL SPURS - our universal ladies spur straps are designed to fit all western spurs.
  • ONE YEAR WARRANTY - this product comes with a one-year limited manufacturer’s warranty that protects against quality issues and defects. To register your product, visit the manufacturer Derby Originals' website.

Width: Tapers from 2.5” to ⅝”

Tahoe Tack's Patterned Nylon Padded Western Noseband for Horses was designed to offer a more modern, attractive, and high-quality nylon noseband option compared to your basic, plain, nylon nosebands that are flimsy and unattractive. Our nosebands are available in six attractive patterns so that you can find the option that best suits you and your horse. Be sure to check out Tahoe Tack's matching nylon overlay browband headstalls, slip ear headstalls, halters. bucket straps, and more!

  • PREMIUM NYLON CONSTRUCTION - these nylon Western nosebands are made from heavy-duty nylon webbing, which is durable, long-lasting, easy to care for, comfortable for your horse to wear, and resistant to rips or tears.
  • PADDED NOSEBAND FOR INCREASED COMFORT - our nylon nosebands feature soft neoprene padding on the underside of the noseband to increase your horse’s comfort during use and promote a healthy fur coat.
  • FEATURES ATTRACTIVE OVERLAY PRINT - our unique nosebands feature modern and stylish printed designs such as Aztec, Chevron, Paisley, and more on the top of the noseband, which lets them stand out compared to regular plain nylon nosebands.

Crown: 38” - 43”
